description: Signature sequence of e (arrange the numbers i+j*x (i,j >= 1) in increasing order; the sequence of i's is the signature of x).
references: C. Kimberling, "Fractal Sequences and Interspersions", Ars Combinatoria, vol. 45 p 157 1997.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: The a(47) term was missing. Corrected by _T. D. Noe_, Aug 12 2008
